import React, { Fragment ,useState} from 'react' const SignIn = () => { const {formData ,setFormData} = useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', password2:'' } ); const {name,email,password,password2}= formData const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) return(

Sign Up

onChange(e)} required />
This site uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email

Already have an account? Sign In

) } export default SignIn
